column1: Hes fighting for college affordability. "I couldnt believe how my 7-year-old was acting with Hillary—swinging her arm hanging on her
He doesnt do that with strangers
I was thinking What are you thinking?! Its Hillary Clinton! "As were walking away I turn around—and theres Hillary and Fayde laughing
She said Are you ticklish? and he said Only in my armpits
And he goes with his tongue out: "Boo-yah
